mapper.sql: USER_CODE, ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, ENABLED, ISSYS, CREATEDATE, DEADLINE, LAST_LOGIN, LOGIN_COUNT, REMARK, CREATER
mapper.update: update T_USERS set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISSYS = #{isSys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEADLINE = to_date(#{deadLine},'yyyy-MM-dd'), REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from T_USERS where user_code in #{item}
